Outcome.DescriptionText: As your troops approach the abandoned warehouse they all agree that this building once cleaned up could provide extra storage for your empire. But as they get closer they see a nest of Antlions that has made its home here and your troops find themselves surrounded by foes.

As your troops approach abandoned warehouse, they notice signs of recent activity. As they explore the warehouse further they accidentally trip a security system which sends out a Remnant distress signal. A detachment of Remnant forces are alerted to your presence and start orbiting the planet.

Here you have made an excellent discovery - Inside the warehouse you found completely intact alien light frigate! What's more, it appears to be spaceworthy and inside of its cargo there is an inactive Remnant Ship.

When your troops enter the warehouse, they find several bodies which appear to belong Corsair pirates. Seems like they were stationed there on guard duty and a fight broke over some money. Since they are all dead now, your forces recover what was left from their fighter squadron.
